element.label: Request to continue existing flex arrangement
element.name: continue_exiting_arrangement

element.name: dependent_over_19

element.label: Care of an unmarried dependent child under age 19

element.label: I do not have one year of service at Stern

element.label: I have one year of service at Stern
element.name: have_one_year_of_service

element.default: Change in start time (up to 1/2 hour earlier or up to 1 hour later than your regularly scheduled start time) while maintaining a 5-day work week. No reason is needed and no eligibility criteria apply. All that is required is supervisory approval. Already existing arrangements of this type do not require continuation approval. However, supervisors can modify any flexible arrangements at any time.
element.label: A. Flex Time Option One
element.name: question_a_description

element.default: Change in work hours (that is outside the parameters noted in Flex Time option A) while maintaining a 5-day work week.
element.label: B. Flex Time Option Two
element.name: question_b_description

element.default: (not to exceed the parameters of a 4-day week: 9.75 hrs/day, which includes 1 hour per day for lunch unless requested and approved as a reasonable accommodation based on a disability)
element.label: C. Compressed Work Week
element.name: question_c_description

element.default: (not to exceed one full day each week unless an exception is approved as reasonable accommodation based on a disability)
element.label: D. Telecommuting
element.name: question_d_description

element.default: E. Conversion from full-time to regular part-time
element.label: Question E
element.name: question_e

element.default: (Note: This option has benefits implications that the employee is advised to explore with her/his Benefits Advisor in advance of making request).
element.label: E. Conversation from full-time to regular part-time
element.name: question_e_description

element.label: Reasonable accommodation based on a disability
element.name: resonable_accommodation

element.label: Spouse or registered domestic partner care
element.name: spouse_partner_care
